alert.note: Alert for Antrim; Charlevoix (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:42PM EDT until May 20 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHEBOYGAN...EAST CENTRAL ANTRIM...OTSEGO... NORTHWESTERN MONTMORENCY AND SOUTHEASTERN CHARLEVOIX COUNTIES... At 342 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elmira, or near Gaylord, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Vanderbilt, Sparr, Pickerel Lake, Johannesburg and Eastern Corwith Township. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
